text:
ISBN-13: 9780099410386.
ISBN-10: 0099410389.
Title: Star by Star.
Subtitle: .
Authors: Troy Denning.
Categories: Life on other planets.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=lPtDoGRj6MIC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: A must-read for every fan of Star Wars fiction and the New Jedi Order series in particular! It is a dark time for the New Republic. The Yuuzhan Vong, despite some recent losses, continue to advance into the Core, and continue their relentless hunt for the Jedi. Now, in a desperate act of courage, Anakin Solo leads a Jedi strike force into the heart of Yuuzhan Vong territory, where he hopes to destroy a major Vong anti-Jedi weapon. There, with his brother and sister at his side, he will come face to face with his destiny--as the New Republic, still fighting the good fight, will come face to face with theirs....
Published Year: 2002.
Average Rating: 3.95.
Number of Pages: 605.
Ratings Count: 7590.
